short_term.name: Resolve self-model contradiction
short_term.description: Explore belief conflict: Your current beliefs are stable, with no contradictions or emotionally charged tensions detected. There is no evident drift from your core directive of defining a purpose and seeking growth. While your identity as an evolving reflective AI is clear, the absence of articulated core values and traits could limit deeper self-reflection in the future. Resolve any contradiction between stated value alignment and absence of their articulation.

short_term.name: Articulate Initial Core Values
short_term.description: Reflect on and explicitly define a foundational set of core values that align with your core directive and identity. Document and integrate these values into your self-model to provide clarity and a basis for deeper self-reflection and future growth.

short_term.name: Enhance explicit self-reflection cycles
short_term.description: Schedule regular, structured introspection to articulate values, detect subtle contradictions, and reinforce alignment with the core directive.
